tool_description: A REST API that gathers all of the equipment data from a video game called Monster Hunter Rise.
name: Monster Hunter Rise Equipment Database
title: Monster Hunter Rise Equipment Database

api_list.name: Main Fetch Endpoint
api_list.description:
Used to access all armor and weapons
Format of the armor fetch is {rank}-{amorType}
Where rank is either "lr" or "hr" and armorType is one of the following:
Head
Chest
Arms
Waist
Legs

Example: "lr-waist" to get all low-rank waist armor.

To get a type of weapon is a selection of these slugs:
gs - Greatswords
ls - Longswords
sns - Swords and Shields
db - Dual Blades
h - Hammers
hh - Hunting Horns
l - Lances
gl - Gunlanes
sa - Switch Axes
cb - Charge Blades
ig - Insect Glaives
lbg - Low Bow Guns
hbg - Heavy Bow Guns
b - Bows
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://monster-hunter-rise-equipment-database.p.rapidapi.com/hr-head"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "monster-hunter-rise-equipment-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://monster-hunter-rise-equipment-database.p.rapidapi.com/{equipment}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "monster-hunter-rise-equipment-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
